REST controller that provides external API access for organization management operations within the OpenFrame platform. Handles CRUD operations with comprehensive filtering, pagination, and search capabilities for organization data.

## Key Components

- **GET /api/v1/organizations** - Retrieves paginated list of organizations with advanced filtering options (category, employee count, contract status)
- **GET /api/v1/organizations/{id}** - Fetches organization by database ID
- **GET /api/v1/organizations/by-organization-id/{organizationId}** - Fetches organization by business identifier
- **POST /api/v1/organizations** - Creates new organization with validation
- **OrganizationService** - Core data access service
- **OrganizationQueryService** - Specialized query operations
- **OrganizationCommandService** - Command operations (create/update/delete)
- **OrganizationMapper** - Converts between DTOs and domain objects

## Usage Example

```java
// Get paginated organizations with filtering
@GetMapping
public OrganizationsResponse getOrganizations(
    @RequestParam(required = false) String category,
    @RequestParam(required = false) Integer minEmployees,
    @RequestParam(required = false) Boolean hasActiveContract,
    @RequestParam(required = false) String search,
    @RequestParam(defaultValue = "20") @Min(1) @Max(100) Integer limit
) {
    // Builds filter criteria and executes query
    OrganizationFilterOptions filterOptions = OrganizationFilterOptions.builder()
        .category(category)
        .minEmployees(minEmployees)
        .hasActiveContract(hasActiveContract)
        .build();
    
    return organizationQueryService.queryOrganizations(
        filterOptions, paginationCriteria, search, sort
    );
}

// Create organization with validation
@PostMapping
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
public OrganizationResponse createOrganization(
    @Valid @RequestBody CreateOrganizationRequest request
) {
    return organizationCommandService.createOrganization(request);
}
```

The controller includes comprehensive OpenAPI documentation, request validation, error handling, and audit logging with user/API key tracking.
